timeline.bodyText: No allowed redirects? Is this intentional?
timeline.author: j-white

replies.bodyText:
yes, I didn't find any link with a redirect pointing to this controller (although I might have missed one). The alternative would be to remove the redirect parameter completely from this controller (would result in the same thing but viewer code). I wonder why we have the redirect parameter if we don't use it:
Either this is just a copy and paste leftover or
I didn't find the link...
replies.author: patrick-schweizer

replies.bodyText: TODO: Patrick add as comment in code
replies.author: patrick-schweizer
